highlights.description: New CLI tools for one-command AWS AgentCore deployment
Full AWS Bedrock AgentCore resource creation with Runtime, Endpoint, and Gateway support

breaking.description: Config directory changed from `~/.agentplexus/` to `~/.plexusone/` for CLI tools

upgradeGuide.description: If using CLI tools, move config from `~/.agentplexus/` to `~/.plexusone/`

added.description: `cmd/deploy` CLI for one-command AWS AgentCore deployment with secrets push, CDK bootstrap, and deploy
`cmd/push-secrets` CLI for pushing .env files to AWS Secrets Manager
`AWS::BedrockAgentCore::Runtime` resource creation for each agent
`AWS::BedrockAgentCore::RuntimeEndpoint` automatic creation for each agent
`AWS::BedrockAgentCore::Gateway` support for external tool integration
Protocol configuration support (HTTP, MCP, A2A)
Enhanced CloudFormation outputs: RuntimeArn, RuntimeId, EndpointArn, GatewayUrl per agent
`Runtimes` and `Endpoints` maps on `AgentCoreStack` for accessing created resources
`Gateway` field on `AgentCoreStack` for gateway resource access
`AuthorizerConfig` and `GatewayConfig` type aliases re-exported from agentkit

changed.description: Module path migrated from `agentplexus` to `plexusone` organization

documentation.description: Updated README and examples for v0.2.0 features
Added TRD for external tools integration with MCP server hosting options
Clarified Gateway vs A2A architecture documentation
Updated release notes with Gateway feature details

dependencies.description: Add AWS SDK Go v2 for CLI tools (secretsmanager, sts, config)

highlights.description: Initial release of AWS CDK constructs for deploying agentkit-based agents to AWS Bedrock AgentCore

added.description: `AgentCoreStack` CDK construct for deploying multi-agent systems
`AgentBuilder` fluent API for configuring individual agents with memory, timeout, environment variables
`StackBuilder` fluent API for composing agents with VPC, observability, and IAM settings
`CfnIncludeBuilder` for importing existing CloudFormation templates into CDK
`NewStackFromFile` and `MustNewStackFromFile` for loading configuration from JSON/YAML
`NewStackFromJSON` and `NewStackFromYAML` for loading configuration from byte data
Re-exported configuration types from `agentkit/platforms/agentcore/iac`
VPC creation with optional VPC endpoints for AWS services
Security group creation for agent communication
IAM execution role with Bedrock, CloudWatch Logs, ECR, and Secrets Manager access
Observability configuration support for Opik, Langfuse, Phoenix, and CloudWatch
Four deployment approaches: CDK Go, CDK+JSON, CfnInclude, Pure CloudFormation

documentation.description: README with comprehensive usage examples for all deployment approaches
Example projects in `examples/` directory for each deployment approach
Configuration reference for StackConfig, AgentConfig, VPCConfig, ObservabilityConfig
